title: Pancakes

nouns: Very thin pancake.
A thin pancake.

A very thin pancake.
A delicacy made of flour, eggs and milk, baked in a frying pan.
A thin batter cake fried on both sides.
A flat type of cake similar to a pancake.
Thin batter cake.
A flat cake of thin batter fried on both sides on a griddle
A thin batter cake fried in a pan or on a griddle in oil or butter.
A pancake is a flat cake, often thin, and round, prepared from a starch-based batter and cooked on a hot surface such as a griddle or frying pan.
A pancake.
Any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body. For prepared ready-to-eat food, use dish: Q746549.
Any substance consumed by living organisms to sustain life.
Food.
Any substance that can be consumed by living organisms, especially by eating, in order to sustain life.
Any solid substance (as opposed to liquid) that is used as a source of nourishment
Food is any substance consumed to provide nutritional support for the body.

description:
A stack of breakfast pancakes, topped with a pad of butter and maple syrup oozing down its golden-brown sides, onto a plate on some platforms. 

Especially popular on Pancake Tuesday.

An alternative use for this emoji on TikTok and other platforms: to represent that someone has a flat bottom ('flat as a pancake').
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the pancakes emoji showcases a delightful stack of three golden-brown discs, each with a subtly textured surface and a glossy sheen. Realistic lighting casts gentle shadows, emphasizing their fluffy appearance, while soft rounded edges ensure a friendly and inviting look. This mouthwatering depiction is perfect for expressing culinary enjoyment, breakfast plans, or a craving for comfort food.
